PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-15702018-12-14ESDC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Pension Plan
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Pension Plan Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA PENSION PLAN REGULATIONS in order to (1) support implementation of Canada Pension Plan (CPP) reform initiatives; (2) remove impediments to the electronic filing of applications for CPP benefits; and, (3) reduce the administrative burden on disabled CPP retirement pension recipients.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0281 Publication Date: 2018-12-26
AttachmentsAttachment
